code:
const template = `

 


Leader’s Speak  


Dear All,

 

I wish you and your family A Very Happy New Year !

 

I am pleased to share the International Business Unit is growing at a rapid pace with significant new opportunities in accounts like SAMSUNG, NTUC & LANDMARK and many more. Over the past 18 months we have been successful in establishing a robust International Business Unit centred around Digital Transformation, we recently won a large Digital Transformation deal at Monster Worldwide.

 

As we move forward into the next financial year the focus would be to provide thought leadership coupled with our strong execution services to our customers in the Digital and Internet/eCommerce space.  My thrust continues to provide more and more International opportunities to all you folks, I am experiencing more and more opportunities coming out of Singapore and ME. I would urge you to reach out and hold on to these opportunities. Also the focus is to provide re-skilling opportunities through our training organization. Please leverage on all the career growth opportunities.

 

In the past quarter we welcomed customers from NTUC Singapore & Samsung. Thanks to your hard word the visits went off well also I am observing Innovation Fest’s have taken a life of their own and is a great way to connect with our customers from innovation stand point.

 

Please join me in welcoming back Rajeev Nagpal to the Infogain Company. He has re-joined us as VP – Delivery for International Business. Rajeev brings a wealth of experience in building and running strong delivery organizations, in his previous avatar with Infogain, he was responsible for establishing Mitchell and NetApp ODC’s. Going forward he shall be working closely with me in building a strong International Business for Infogain Company.

 

Once again thanks team for all the hard work.

 

Cheers !

Manoj Mittal | Sr. VP -  International Business Unit

 

 Existing Logos

 

 

 

Technical Article by Venkat - Team NTUC


Infogain assisted NTUC Link in identifying a revenue leak for one of their key accounts during Remarketing Campaign execution :

 

 Employee Spotlight  

 


I have been associated with Infogain for more than a year and a half now and my exponential learning curves remains as strong as it was on day one. Having been new to project management, I had the opportunity to learn the tricks of the trades from very experienced people which has helped me in shaping myself as a true professional. In my short stint, I have worked closely with multiple clients and stakeholders which has provided me with cross-functional experience and helped me in enhancing my management skills.

 

What motivates you  - I would say “FEAR”.  Fear can be a source of energy and motivation if you can learn how to turn it into something positive. The fear of failure, the fear of missing an opportunity. Every time I overcome fear, I am stronger and for me embracing fear is embracing growth.

 

What do you like best in Infogain  - the kind of work I do, “freedom” takes on a very specific meaning and this is what I like most about Infogain. The freedom of allowing employees and giving them the autonomy to take charge and work in the direction which best suits your productivity.  It is the freedom to make my decisions which makes me feel more responsible and empowered.

 

Tell us about your role model and why do you look up to that person -  I have been a great admirer of sports and sportspersons throughout my life and I look up to Rafael Nadal as my role model. His Intensity and passion in what he does and never say die attitude is something I admire. I wish I can imbibe his humility and tenacity in my life as well.

 

Your idea about effective leadership - For me effective leadership is all about a keen sense of justice. Without a sense of fairness and justice towards you peers, you juniors and seniors, no leader can command and retain the respect of his followers.

 

What are you passionate about - I am inquisitive in nature and always passionate about learning new things,  not just in my workplace but beyond that as well. I keep budging my seniors at Infogain about how they are solving their day to day issues at work. The important thing is not to stop questioning. It ignites discovery.

 

A memorable moment at Infogain - I would say it was my first day at workplace. I joined Infogain fresh out of my MBA and though I had a good number of work experience earlier,  the fact that there had been a gap of 2 years since I last worked, was always in the back of my mind. It felt as if I was a fresher all over again. I was nervous to start off with my new role but once I sat in the cubicle with my laptop and a cup of coffee I knew I always belonged here.

 

What is that none of the people in Infogain know about you - That I have a case study published in Cranfield University, UK  in 2016 on Delhi’s dismal state of pollution and odd-even formula to curb it.

 

Your Vision for Infogain - The science of today is the technology of tomorrow. We should keep working with newer technology. By leveraging new technology, especially when coming to it ahead of the curve makes it’s highly likely that Infogain will see beneficial results.

 

If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be - Procrastination – I am actively working towards my habits to overcome it.

 

Your favourite quote/ Motto of life - “It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is the most adaptable to change” - Charles Darwin

 

Employee Testimonials

Dubai All Hands Meet – organized on Aug 2018 –  Mr. Sunil Bhatia and Mr. Eddie Chandhok spoke about Infogain's plan and target for FY2019, updated the Team behind the rational for new tag line "Engineering Business Outcomes", briefed the Team on Infogain's 4 core values, trends/technologies for future. Motivated the Team to cross-train themselves and adoption on modern age technologies, steps which Infogain has taken to cross-train the resources including conducting regular training etc.  Mr. Manoj Mittal has updated the Team with his growth plans for region and congratulated the Team for all good work which is done in past. He also requested the Team for continuous support and more collaboration/focus to grow the region and assured his support and commitment towards Team.  Executive Team also answered the various questions asked by Team during the event, followed by drinks and dinner.

Glimpses of the event

Employee Testimonials


I have been working in NTUC-MMS for 4-5 months and even in such a small duration of time, I got the exposure and opportunities to learn new technologies and enhance my skill set. The clients appreciate our hard work. The managers and team members are very helpful and cooperative. It's a wonderful experience altogether and I really feel very proud to be a part of NTUC.
 

Diksha Solanki - Software Engineer - Team – NTUC

 

 

NTUC gives opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies which backed me up to experiment more. I am delighted to get exciting opportunities to work on trending technologies such as big data, AWS and analytics. Our leadership, best team and suave client together renders a great environment to work and excel in overall demeanour.        

 

Taiyaba Quraishi - Consultant - Team – NTUC

 

 


It's been a pleasure working with NTUC and the opportunity we get to work on Singapore’s one of the largest enterprise application. Also, we get the exposure of working on state of the art technologies in a challenging yet rewarding environment which helped our team in their professional growth. Moreover, we appreciate the positive lift we get from NTUC client visits which boasts the team morale.

 

Dashmeet Singh - Consultant - Team – NTUC


 

Working with NTUC "Plus! Where2Buy" is a great pleasure for me. Quality work, great environment, best team and learning opportunities are the reasons why I like to work here. This has really been an enriching experience, and I feel much more confident now in my overall demeanour.

 

Namrata Paliwal - UI Consultant – Team – NTUC

 

 

 

Let’s Applaud  

 

Ø  Team – PayTM received appreciation from client and some monthly awards were given to fellow Infogainers.
Details below:

Ø  Team NTUC received client appreciation. Below are some testimonials:

 


A great document on the progress of the product and features. Link team, do read this and see what the product is up to. Provide input and see how products are evolving. Other products are coming similarly.  Special thanks to the India team. -Sandeep Bhalla - CEO, NTUC Link 1st Sep 2018

 

Big congratulations on yesterday's production deployment and closing 90% of SEO tasks! Thanks, I am really impressed by your hard (and often overtime) work during this sprint. -Natalya Kosenko - Product Manager, Digital products 24th Aug 2018

 

Team  India – As always, this couldn’t have been possible without all your hard work. Kudos to all. Let’s keep raising the bar.  -Vasanth Kumar -  Head Engineering 31t Aug 2018

 

Thanks. This is awesome Nik and team. Wonderful to see the initial results and focus. Keep going.  -Sandeep Bhalla - CEO, NTUC Link 27th Sep 2018

 

Kudos to W2B Team for all Innovation done in W2B Product. Rest of the teams they should model themselves like W2B team and Learn from W2B Team.” -Sandeep Bhalla CEO, NTUC Link 8th Oct 2018.

 

Event Glimpses  

 

Ø  Client Visit  - Natalya Kosenko – Product manager  visited Infogain Noida office in the month of Aug’18 and spent time with the NTUC team.

 

 

Ø  Times International Team Get – Together

 

 

Let’s Congratulate!!   

 

                                             


Satyaveer Singh part of Dubai Customs team has been blessed with a baby girl on 14th Sept 2018.

 

`;

Leader’s Speak  


Dear All,

 

I wish you and your family A Very Happy New Year !

 

I am pleased to share the International Business Unit is growing at a rapid pace with significant new opportunities in accounts like SAMSUNG, NTUC & LANDMARK and many more. Over the past 18 months we have been successful in establishing a robust International Business Unit centred around Digital Transformation, we recently won a large Digital Transformation deal at Monster Worldwide.

 

As we move forward into the next financial year the focus would be to provide thought leadership coupled with our strong execution services to our customers in the Digital and Internet/eCommerce space.  My thrust continues to provide more and more International opportunities to all you folks, I am experiencing more and more opportunities coming out of Singapore and ME. I would urge you to reach out and hold on to these opportunities. Also the focus is to provide re-skilling opportunities through our training organization. Please leverage on all the career growth opportunities.

 

In the past quarter we welcomed customers from NTUC Singapore & Samsung. Thanks to your hard word the visits went off well also I am observing Innovation Fest’s have taken a life of their own and is a great way to connect with our customers from innovation stand point.

 

Please join me in welcoming back Rajeev Nagpal to the Infogain Company. He has re-joined us as VP – Delivery for International Business. Rajeev brings a wealth of experience in building and running strong delivery organizations, in his previous avatar with Infogain, he was responsible for establishing Mitchell and NetApp ODC’s. Going forward he shall be working closely with me in building a strong International Business for Infogain Company.

 

Once again thanks team for all the hard work.

 

Cheers !

Manoj Mittal | Sr. VP -  International Business Unit

The freedom of allowing employees and giving them the autonomy to take charge and work in the direction which best suits your productivity.  It is the freedom to make my decisions which makes me feel more responsible and empowered.

His Intensity and passion in what he does and never say die attitude is something I admire. I wish I can imbibe his humility and tenacity in my life as well.

I keep budging my seniors at Infogain about how they are solving their day to day issues at work. The important thing is not to stop questioning. It ignites discovery.

Your Vision for Infogain - The science of today is the technology of tomorrow. We should keep working with newer technology. By leveraging new technology, especially when coming to it ahead of the curve makes it’s highly likely that Infogain will see beneficial results.

 

If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be - Procrastination – I am actively working towards my habits to overcome it.

 

Your favourite quote/ Motto of life - “It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is the most adaptable to change” - Charles Darwin

 

Employee Testimonials

Dubai All Hands Meet – organized on Aug 2018 –  Mr. Sunil Bhatia and Mr. Eddie Chandhok spoke about Infogain's plan and target for FY2019, updated the Team behind the rational for new tag line "Engineering Business Outcomes", briefed the Team on Infogain's 4 core values, trends/technologies for future. He also requested the Team for continuous support and more collaboration/focus to grow the region and assured his support and commitment towards Team.  Executive Team also answered the various questions asked by Team during the event, followed by drinks and dinner.

I have been working in NTUC-MMS for 4-5 months and even in such a small duration of time, I got the exposure and opportunities to learn new technologies and enhance my skill set. The clients appreciate our hard work. The managers and team members are very helpful and cooperative. It's a wonderful experience altogether and I really feel very proud to be a part of NTUC.

Moreover, we appreciate the positive lift we get from NTUC client visits which boasts the team morale.

Working with NTUC "Plus! Where2Buy" is a great pleasure for me. Quality work, great environment, best team and learning opportunities are the reasons why I like to work here. This has really been an enriching experience, and I feel much more confident now in my overall demeanour.

Thanks. This is awesome Nik and team. Wonderful to see the initial results and focus. Keep going.  -Sandeep Bhalla - CEO, NTUC Link 27th Sep 2018

 

Kudos to W2B Team for all Innovation done in W2B Product. Rest of the teams they should model themselves like W2B team and Learn from W2B Team.” -Sandeep Bhalla CEO, NTUC Link 8th Oct 2018.
